price: (Dikatakan kepada mereka), "Ini adalah suatu rombongan (pengikut-pengikutmu) yang masuk berdesak-desak bersama kamu (ke neraka)".  (Berkata pemimpin-pemimpin mereka yang durhaka), "Tiadalah ucapan selamat datang kepada mereka karena sesungguhnya mereka akan masuk neraka".
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
